payment.title: Pay by card
payment.text: Your credit card will be charged for:

homepage.title: QA Auto
homepage.welcome.part1: You can buy or sell your car.
homepage.welcome.part2: In case of sale, you have the possibility to have the car inspected by a professional surveyor or even individually.
homepage.card1.title: I'm looking for a car
homepage.card1.text: Here at QAauto, you can buy or sell you car. In case of sale, you have the possibility to have the car inspected by a professional surveyor or even individually
homepage.card2.title: I have a car to sell
homepage.card2.text: Here at QAauto, you can buy or sell you car. In case of sale, you have the possibility to have the car inspected by a professional surveyor or even individually
homepage.card2.button: I have a car to sell
homepage.card3.title: I would join as a service or inspector
homepage.card3.text: You have the possibility to join as an official service, as an inspector, so you can start receiving requests.
homepage.card4.title: I have a question
homepage.card4.text: Here at QAauto, you can buy or sell you car. In case of sale, you have the possibility to have the car inspected by a professional surveyor or even individually

sellPage.title: Sell your car with us
sellPage.part1: You can sell your car after an inspection
sellPage.part2: You can do this for free, but there will be no profit
sellPage.part3: With a professional surveyor, buyers are 81% more likely to buy a car because they are assured that every detail of the car has been revealed.
sellPage.part4.2: , which includes a full survey, suggestions and highlighting for advertising.
sellPage.card1.title: Find a surveyor
sellPage.card2.title: I'll inspect my car myself

chooseInspector.title: Choose inspector
chooseInspector.part1: Choose your inspector, then let them know, where to meet
chooseInspector.part2: A one-off inspection costs 20.000 Ft, which includes a full inspection, suggestions and highlighting for advertising.
chooseInspector.part3: The following inspectors are within your selected area

chosenInspector.title: Details
chosenInspector.part1: Tell us where to meet. The inspector will then make an appointment with you by email or phone

emailSent.title: Email sent
emailSent.part1: The inspector will reach for you soon

buyPage.title: We help you find your car
buyPage.part1: If you don't know what you're looking for, here are some alternatives
buyPage.part2: If you know what you're looking for, just give us the details
buyPage.part3: Whichever you choose, all you have to do is sit back and the offers will come
buyPage.card1.title: I know what I am looking for
buyPage.card2.title: I do not know what I am looking for
buyPage.card2.text: We help you find your ideal car
